bug.author: lizheshus
bug.description:
Description Attempted to train a simple 2-class xgb model with over 300 features but got "SyntaxError: more than 255 arguments". Reproduction Steps Train a xgb model with a dataset having over 255 features. Expected Behavior No error is expected.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42992324/88875414-c9eb9700-d253-11ea-8993-b2e4e88997e5.png></denchmark-link>
Environment (Please complete the following information):
OS: MAC Browser: Crhome
Additional Notes
